com.gej.map

Class MapManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gej.map.MapManager

  • public class MapManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A manager to control the order of maps to be loaded. Has the flexibility to add new maps and to load a null map. Can also be used to go to previous map or next map.
    Author:
    Sri Harsha Chilakapati

      The id of the current map

        Goes to the first map.

      • hasNextMap

        public static boolean hasNextMap()
        Returns true if there is another map in order
        Returns:
        Whether a map is present to be loaded next

      • hasPreviousMap

        public static boolean hasPreviousMap()
        Returns true if a map exists before this map
        Returns:
        Whether a map is present to be loaded before.

        public static void reloadMap()
        Reloads the current map

      • loadNullMap

        public static void loadNullMap()
        Loads a null map. Equivalent to calling Map.clearObjects()

      • loadMap

        public static void loadMap(int mapNum)
        Loads a map with a specified index.
        Parameters:
        mapNum - The number of map in order
